alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 30 at 1:32PM MST until December 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THURSDAY TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 10 to 20 MPH with gusts up to 45 MPH expected. * WHERE...The Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau, Chinle Valley, Black Mesa, White Mountains, The Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County. * WHEN...From 9 PM Thursday to 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains
